title: Chat operator - sales assistant
job_overview:
We seek experienced chat operators to help engage audience, retain followers and build sales. 

Your role will consist of engaging customers in conversations to build long term, friendly relationships and drive an increased in revenue through these communications. 

The ideal candidate will already be familiar with the system and be able to demonstrate experience. They will have perfect English language and grammar skills. Reliable WIFI. Be flexible with shifts. 

Tell me about your experience and please include the initial of the platform. 

If you dont have experience, please do not send me an application. 

Full brand training is given and base salary plus commission is paid. 

Thank you
